data.title: Dr Hasan Shaheed: QMUL School of Engineering and Materials Science
data.meta_site_name: QMUL School of Engineering and Materials Science
data.text:
Expertise: Design, model developments, control and optimisation of autonomous, robotics and renewable energy systems using traditional, artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) approaches. Application areas include i) Aerial/ Solar Aerial robots for inspection/ monitoring, ii) Medical Robotics: Capsule robots for GI tract inspection, Surgical robotic retractor, iii) Assistive Technologies: prosthetics, elderly care robots, iv) Remote inspection/handling robots, v) Renewable Energy Systems: PV, Wind turbine, Pressure retarded osmosis, vi) Renewable energy-driven water treatment, vii) Expert systems. AI/ML approaches include deep learning, reinforcement learning neural networks, fuzzy logic, and biologically inspired optimisation techniques: GAs, Whale Optimisation, Grey Wolf Optimisation, etc. Affiliations: National Teaching Fellow

Senior Fellow, Higher Education Academy

CEng (Chartered Engineer)

Member, The Institution of Engineering and Technology, MIET

Member, The Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers, MIEEE
